body:
<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#24770](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/24770) (Put lock logging behind DEBUG_LOCKCONTENTION preprocessor directive by jonatack)
* [#24545](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/24545) (BIP324: Enable v2 P2P encrypted transport by dhruv)
* [#24474](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/24474) (Additional thread safety annotations for CNode/Peer by ajtowns)
* [#24341](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/24341) (build: remove some no-longer-needed var unexporting from configure by fanquake)
* [#24157](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/24157) (p2p: Replace RecursiveMutex `cs_totalBytesSent`  with Mutex and rename it by w0xlt)
* [#24141](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/24141) (Rename message_command variables in src/net* and src/rpc/net.cpp by shaavan)
* [#24005](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/24005) (test: add python implementation of Elligator squared by stratospher)
* [#23561](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23561) (BIP324: Handshake prerequisites by dhruv)
* [#23443](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23443) (p2p: Erlay support signaling by naumenkogs)
* [#23432](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23432) (BIP324: CPubKey encode/decode to elligator-squared by dhruv)
* [#23352](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23352) (test: Extend stale_tip_peer_management test by MarcoFalke)
* [#23233](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23233) (BIP324: Add encrypted p2p transport {de}serializer by dhruv)
* [#22910](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/22910) (net: Encapsulate asmap in NetGroupManager by jnewbery)
* [#22851](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/22851) ([WIP] Add Python ChaCha20 and bindings for CPP ChaCha20 by siv2r)
* [#22778](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/22778) (net processing: Reduce resource usage for inbound block-relay-only connections by jnewbery)
* [#21527](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/21527) (net_processing: lock clean up by ajtowns)
* [#20726](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/20726) (p2p: Add DISABLETX message for negotiating block-relay-only connections by sdaftuar)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
